message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it provides. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $975000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am willing to consider a price of $960000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell it to you for $970000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $965000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your target, but I still think I can do better. I'm willing to sell it to you for $968000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. I am willing to pay $962500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your target, but I still think I can do better. I'm willing to sell it to you for $965000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to pay $960000 for the product.
